lead_paragraph: China has for decades chipped away at Taiwan’s global standing, but now the island is pushing back with behind-the-scenes diplomacy and soft power.

headline.print_headline: Without a Seat for 45 Years, a Frustrated Taiwan Presses On
headline.main: Sidelined at the U.N., a Frustrated Taiwan Presses On

snippet: China has for decades chipped away at Taiwan’s global standing, but now the island is pushing back with behind-the-scenes diplomacy and soft power....
abstract: United Nations Memo; Taiwanese activists and diplomats have begun renewed effort to highlight China's efforts to sideline nation and to win greater influence on world stage; among efforts are those aimed at allowing Taiwan's participation in some United Nations bodies and to allow Taiwanese diplomats in Washington.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
